title: RPG Character System - Static Methods
description: Master static methods - class-level methods that don't require instances. Use static methods for factories, utilities, and class-level operations.

concepts.static_methods: Methods that belong to the class itself, not instances
concepts.static_keyword: Keyword to define class-level methods and properties
concepts.class_level_operations: Operations that don't require instance state
concepts.factory_pattern: Using static methods to create and configure instances
concepts.utility_methods: Class methods for shared calculations and helpers

learning_outcomes: Understand static methods and their use cases
Use static keyword for class-level operations
Create factory methods with static functions
Distinguish between instance and static methods
